channel.title: Authorization on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in Authorization on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: authorino-operator
item.description:
Description

Kubernetes operator for managing Authorino instances, a K8s-native AuthN/AuthZ service to protect your APIs.

  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/authorino-operator/
  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/authorino/

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
authorino-operator default âŒ â€” 22 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– authorino-operator

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (22)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
